Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0286 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-0286 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hvloader is earlier than 1.0.1-4, affected by CVE-2023-0286
